trans-unit.source: Specifies the key derivation function that the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng"></xref> class will use to convert secret agreements into key material.
trans-unit.target: Angir nøkkelen utledningen fungerer som den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng"> </xref> klasse skal bruke til å konvertere hemmelige avtaler til key materiale.

trans-unit.source: The ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction enumeration defines the type of algorithm that will be used to transform a raw secret agreement into key material.
trans-unit.target: Opplistingen ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction definerer typen algoritmen som brukes til å transformere en raw hemmelig avtale i nøkkelen materiale.

trans-unit.source: The secret agreement is the value that is generated from a private key and the other party’s public key, as part of the key exchange.
trans-unit.target: Hemmelig avtale er verdien som er generert fra en privat nøkkel og Motpartens fellesnøkkel som en del av nøkkelutvekslingen.

trans-unit.source: It is the seed value for the key material that is generated by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.DeriveKeyMaterial%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Det er seedverdi for nøkkelen materiale som genereres av den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.DeriveKeyMaterial%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.DeriveKeyMaterial%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.KeyDerivationFunction%2A> property uses this enumeration to get the key derivation function for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.KeyDerivationFunction%2A>Egenskapen bruker denne opplisting for å få funksjonen key utledning for <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng>klasse.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.KeyDerivationFunction%2A>

trans-unit.source: A hash algorithm is used to generate key material.
trans-unit.target: En nummeralgoritme brukes til å generere nøkkelen materiale.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.HashAlgorithm*> property specifies the name of the algorithm to use.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.HashAlgorithm*>egenskapen angir navnet på algoritmen som skal brukes.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.HashAlgorithm*>

trans-unit.source: If the algorithm name is not specified, <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.SHA256"></xref> is used as the default algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Hvis algoritmen navnet ikke er angitt, <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.SHA256"> </xref> brukes som standard algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: You can also specify the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.SecretPrepend%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.SecretAppend%2A> properties, but they are not required.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.SecretPrepend%2A>og <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.SecretAppend%2A>Egenskaper, men de er nødvendige.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.SecretAppend%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.SecretPrepend%2A>

trans-unit.source: The amount of key material that is generated is equivalent to the size of the hash value for the specified algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Hvor mye key materiale som genereres tilsvarer størrelsen på hash-verdien for den angitte algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: A Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC) algorithm is used to generate key material.
trans-unit.target: En Hash-baserte Message Authentication Code (HMAC)-algoritme brukes til å generere nøkkelen materiale.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.HmacKey*> property specifies the key to use. Either this property must be set or the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.UseSecretAgreementAsHmacKey*> property must be set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException"></xref> is thrown when you use Hmac.
trans-unit.target: Den <> </> *> egenskapen angir nøkkelen som brukes. Enten denne egenskapen må være angitt eller <> </> *> egenskapen må være satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>; ellers en <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException"> </xref> forårsakes når du bruker Hmac.

trans-unit.source: If both properties are set, the secret agreement is used as the HMAC key.
trans-unit.target: Hvis begge egenskapene er angitt, brukes den hemmelige avtalen som nøkkelen for HMAC.

trans-unit.source: You can also specify the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.SecretPrepend%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.SecretAppend%2A> properties, but they are not required.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.SecretPrepend%2A>og <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.SecretAppend%2A>Egenskaper, men de er nødvendige.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.SecretAppend%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.SecretPrepend%2A>

trans-unit.source: The amount of key material that is generated is equivalent to the size of the HMAC value.
trans-unit.target: Hvor mye key materiale som genereres tilsvarer størrelsen på verdien for HMAC.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: The Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol is used to generate key material.
trans-unit.target: Protokollen sikkerhet TLS (Transport Layer) brukes til å generere nøkkelen materiale.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.Seed*> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.Label*> properties must be set; otherwise, a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException"></xref> is thrown when you use Tls.
trans-unit.target: Den <> </> *> og <> </> *> egenskaper må være angitt; ellers, en <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException"> </xref> forårsakes når du bruker Tls.

trans-unit.source: This value generates 160 bits of key material.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien genererer 160 biter key oppbygning.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
